                                  double top10GoogleKeywordContainmentInTitle,
                                  double top10GoogleKeywordContainmentInURL)
Parameters:
cpc - cost-per-click
serpsBroad - number of search results on google in broad mode
ppcAdvertisers - number of pay-per-click advertisers
monthlyExactSearches - number of exact searches per month
serpsPhraseInUrl - number of search results on google if searching in URLs
monthlyBroadSearches - number of broad searches per month
serpsPhraseInTitle - number of search results on google if searching in title
serpsPhrase - number of search on google in phrase mode
top10GoogleKeywordContainmentInHeadline -
top10GoogleKeywordContainmentInTitle -
top10GoogleKeywordContainmentInURL -
Returns:
a double meaning the relevancy of the related keyword
